items.title: De herinneringen van Clarence Seedorf aan 1995: 'Ik waande me in het paradijs'
items.summary: Voetbal International viert dit jaar zijn zestigjarig jubileum. Naar aanleiding daarvan herplaatsen we elke dag in het weekeinde een verhaal uit ons rijke archief. Ditmaal uit 2015, als Clarence Seedorf in Milaan twintig jaar na dato terugkijkt op zijn Europese triomftocht met Ajax. ‚ÄòVlak voor de aftrap keken we elkaar aan en iedereen wist: Nu is het showtime.‚Äô

items.title: Van Gerwen: I don't care about two Lukes right now
items.summary: Michael van Gerwen says he "does not care" about Luke Littler and Luke Humphries until he faces one of the two title favourites at the World Darts Championship.

items.title: Duel tussen Nottingham Forest en Manchester City zaterdag niet bij Viaplay te zien
items.summary: Hoewel de Premier League-rechten bij Viaplay liggen, wordt de wedstrijd tussen Nottingham Forest en Manchester City zaterdag niet uitgezonden door de streamingdienst. Door een deal met Prime Video is die pot op dat platform exclusief te zien.

items.title: England win first Test in Australia in 15 years after thrilling two-dayer at MCG
items.summary: England avoided any danger of an Ashes whitewash after ending an 18-Test and 15-year winless streak in Australia with a two-day victory in a remarkable match at Melbourne to cut their hosts' lead to 3-1 with one game to go.

items.title: How Guardiola made Man City title contenders again - tactical analysis
items.summary: After their Premier League domination came to an abrupt end last season, how has Pep Guardiola changed things tactically to bring about Manchester City's recent revival?

items.title: Makeshift Man United scrap to win over Newcastle, offering hope for rough stretch ahead
items.summary: Man United's win over Newcastle on Boxing Day may be Ruben Amorim's most satisfying yet as they overcame a depleted squad.

items.title: Premier League Boxing Day recap: Man United hold off Newcastle
items.summary: Take a look back at the Premier League action from the holiday.

items.title: Stokes 'over the moon' as England win at MCG and avoid Ashes whitewash
Amorim hails 'spirit' of depleted Man Utd in win
items.summary: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim lauded his team's spirit and togetherness after a depleted squad beat Newcastle on Friday.

items.title: Wrexham's Moore delighted with brace vs. ex-club
items.summary: Kieffer Moore was pleased to silence the Sheffield United fans after his double inspired a superb Wrexham fightback on Boxing Day.

items.title: Morocco's historic winning streak snapped by Mali
items.summary: Morocco and Mali played to a 1-1 draw on Friday in their second AFCON Group A match, with both sides converting penalties awarded after VAR interventions.

items.title: 'We suffered together' - Amorim changes style as Man Utd win
items.summary: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim was rewarded for a change in style and formation with a hard-fought win over Newcastle in the Premier League.

items.title: 'Sometimes you need to adapt': Why Amorim finally changed Man Utd formation
items.summary: "Sometimes you need to adapt and there is no tactic in that moment," said Ruben Amorim after Manchester United's 1-0 win over Newcastle. He was responding after acknowledging that he had gone with a back six late in the game.

items.title: Scorecard: Australia vs England, fourth Ashes Test, Melbourne
Afcon roundup: Mohamed Salah strikes again as 10-man Egypt hold off South Africa
items.summary: Salah penalty puts Egypt into last 16 Hosts Morocco held by Mali in 1-1 draw Mohamed Salah scored a first-half penalty as 10-man Egypt defeated South Africa 1-0 in their Africa Cup of Nations Group B clash in Agadir to become the first team into the knockout stages of the competition. Egypt have six points from their opening two games and cannot finish outside of the top two in the group. South Africa have three points from their two games. Continue reading...

items.title: Bondscoach Mali snapt niets van arbitrage: 'Maar als je voor 69.000 mensen fluit'
items.summary: Bij Mali zijn ze niet honderd procent tevreden met het gelijkspel tegen Marokko op de Afrika Cup . Tom Saintfiet - de bondscoach van Mali die van Belgische aard is - vind dat zijn elftal nog een strafschop had kunnen krijgen.

items.title: Vervanger van De Ligt bewierookt: 'Hij was fenomenaal'
items.summary: De verdediging van Manchester United heeft dit seizoen al veel te verduren gehad, maar hield in het gewonnen Boxing Day-duel met Newcastle United eindelijk weer eens de nul. Dat leverde na afloop de nodige complimenten op, met name voor de vervanger van de geblesseerde Matthijs de Ligt.

items.title: Stunning Dorgu volley gives Man Utd win over Newcastle
items.summary: Manchester United hold on to take all three points in a hard-fought 1-0 win against Newcastle, with Ruben Amorim's side moving into the top five.

items.title: Marokko nog koploper in Groep C vanwege gelijkspel Comoren en Zambia
items.summary: Traditiegetrouw wordt er in Engeland gevoetbald op Boxing Day. Ditmaal geen uitgebreid programma, maar slechts √©√©n duel: Manchester United tegen Newcastle United. Daarnaast speelt Marokko om 21.00 uur in de Afrika Cup tegen Mali. Volg de duels in deze VI Live.

items.title: Patrick Dorgu volley powers Manchester United into fifth as Newcastle misfire
items.summary: Boxing Day‚Äôs sole Premier League fixture tingled the senses and was graced by Patrick Dorgu‚Äôs finish that moved Manchester United up to a season-high fifth. They could ‚Äì and maybe should ‚Äì have been limited to a draw because Newcastle United dominated the second period. The visitors‚Äô problem was a lack of cutting edge. Towards the end Joelinton pulled the trigger with the goal begging but drilled only into Senne Lammens‚Äô gloves. Joe Willock did the same with a cross. Then, Anthony Gordon spurned one more clear chance. Continue reading...
